name: Solar Power AI
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Gain a free [Control Router] [in this city]
quote: If an Artificial Intelligence could bring us through the fallout of a contaminated desert, they can surely lead us on our way to make the wasteland usable again.

civilopediaText.text: If an Artificial Intelligence could bring us through the fallout of a contaminated desert, they can surely lead us on our way to make the wasteland usable again.

name: Life Creation Lab
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Unsellable] buildings [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: A special laboratory operated by machina for the purpose of creating synthetic organisms.
